query:
-- Create partner_companies table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_companies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  companyName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  partnerType VARCHAR(100),
  website VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  primaryContactName VARCHAR(255),
  primaryContactEmail VARCHAR(255),
  primaryContactPhone VARCHAR(20),
  partnerStatus VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Active',
  mdfBudget DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 50000,
  commissionRate INT DEFAULT 15,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Create partner_users table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  partnerCompanyId INT NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  passwordHash VARCHAR(255),
  emailVerified BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  contactName VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(20),
  partnerRole VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'User',
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (partnerCompanyId) REFERENCES partner_companies(id)
);

-- Create partner_deals table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_deals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  partnerCompanyId INT NOT NULL,
  dealName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  dealValue DECIMAL(12,2),
  dealCurrency VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'USD',
  dealStage VARCHAR(100),
  expectedCloseDate DATE,
  dealDescription TEXT,
  customerName VARCHAR(255),
  customerEmail VARCHAR(255),
  customerCompany VARCHAR(255),
  productCategory VARCHAR(255),
  submittedBy INT,
  dealStatus VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending Review',
  commissionPercentage INT DEFAULT 15,
  commissionAmount DECIMAL(12,2),
  commissionPaid BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  approvedBy INT,
  approvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  rejectionReason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (partnerCompanyId) REFERENCES partner_companies(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (submittedBy) REFERENCES partner_users(id)
);

-- Create partner_resources table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_resources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  partnerCompanyId INT NOT NULL,
  resourceName VARCHAR(255),
  resourceType VARCHAR(100),
  resourceUrl VARCHAR(500),
  description TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (partnerCompanyId) REFERENCES partner_companies(id)
);

-- Create partner_mdf_claims table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_mdf_claims (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  partnerCompanyId INT NOT NULL,
  dealId INT,
  amountClaimed DECIMAL(10,2),
  amountApproved DECIMAL(10,2),
  claimStatus VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending',
  claimDescription TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (partnerCompanyId) REFERENCES partner_companies(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (dealId) REFERENCES partner_deals(id)
);

-- Create partner_companies table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_companies (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  companyName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  partnerType VARCHAR(100),
  website VARCHAR(255),

  primaryContactEmail VARCHAR(255),
  primaryContactPhone VARCHAR(20),
  partnerStatus VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Active',
  mdfBudget DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 50000,
  commissionRate INT DEFAULT 15,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

-- Create partner_users table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_users (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  partnerCompanyId INT NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
  passwordHash VARCHAR(255),
  emailVerified BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  contactName VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(20),
  partnerRole VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'User',
  isActive BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (partnerCompanyId) REFERENCES partner_companies(id)
);

-- Create partner_deals table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_deals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  partnerCompanyId INT NOT NULL,
  dealName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  dealValue DECIMAL(12,2),
  dealCurrency VARCHAR(3) DEFAULT 'USD',
  dealStage VARCHAR(100),
  expectedCloseDate DATE,
  dealDescription TEXT,
  customerName VARCHAR(255),
  customerEmail VARCHAR(255),
  customerCompany VARCHAR(255),
  productCategory VARCHAR(255),
  submittedBy INT,
  dealStatus VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending Review',
  commissionPercentage INT DEFAULT 15,
  commissionAmount DECIMAL(12,2),
  commissionPaid BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  approvedBy INT,
  approvedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  rejectionReason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (partnerCompanyId) REFERENCES partner_companies(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (submittedBy) REFERENCES partner_users(id)
);

-- Create partner_resources table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_resources (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  partnerCompanyId INT NOT NULL,
  resourceName VARCHAR(255),
  resourceType VARCHAR(100),
  resourceUrl VARCHAR(500),
  description TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (partnerCompanyId) REFERENCES partner_companies(id)
);

-- Create partner_mdf_claims table
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS partner_mdf_claims (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  partnerCompanyId INT NOT NULL,
  dealId INT,
  amountClaimed DECIMAL(10,2),
  amountApproved DECIMAL(10,2),
  claimStatus VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT 'Pending',
  claimDescription TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (partnerCompanyId) REFERENCES partner_companies(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (dealId) REFERENCES partner_deals(id)
);
